extendedInfo.description: THIS IS A WIDGET ONLY! A guide for starting it can be found here: http://www.packageapps.com/home/startingwidgets.Shift Calendar Widget provides a quick and easy way for shift workers to know which shift is currently working and provides the user with current time, month, day of week, and day of month.IMPORTANT! If you have an App Killer app installed on your phone, make sure you add FD Shift Calendar Widget to the ignore list to ensure the clock and shift continue to update.

reviews.title: Thanks devs
reviews.comment: A buddy tried another app just to find out its a trial.. all I needed was a simple app to keep track of my 24s/48s. Quick to set up and can color code A B and C shifts to match your dept calendar. You can even set it for dept that work 2 on 3 off.
reviews.author: Anthony Intelisano

reviews.title: Firefighter\'s Wife
reviews.comment: It is perfect for a firefighter\'s wife! No more messed up plans cause Daddy has to work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does exactly what I want, large time & date banner with shift on-duty today and shift calendar. Easy one touch to open shift calendar
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Keeps track of my SO\'s 2x4 schedule nicely. I\'d like the option to show only the shift in the widget, hiding the date and time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So so
reviews.comment: Nice calendar feature but on shift day it changes shifts before hands even after programming it correctly.
reviews.author: Mr. Oscar

reviews.comment: Stuck on \"A\" shift... Will not change to B or C shifts on appropriate day. Can this be fixed?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app. The widget time on my sprint samsung moment does not update....please fix bug...thx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yes!
reviews.comment: Best FD shift app ever. I hope the actual calendar becomes a widget at some point!
reviews.author: DJRicky Bobby

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: Good widget for keeping track of shifts and rotation, but each time it updates the app, I have to reprogram the settings. Otherwise, I enjoy the convenience and rotation glance feature.
reviews.author: Darrin Forsyth

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Easy to set up if you read the directions.  Works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fd calendar
reviews.comment: This is a cool app to have if your a firefighter, helps keep track of the days u work in advance. Are more colors gonna be added?...... Just for fun
reviews.author: Antoine Pittman

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: I would prefer it have option for no widget, option to change widget size, an option to sync w/ google calendar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Amazing app! Best of its kind and better than any you can buy!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t \'do\' British fire watch rota :-(
reviews.comment: Looked to be good, but doesn\'t appear to support British 2,2,4 pattern. Shame
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it and it works great. But, I would like the ability to change the letters to match the colors of my shifts like G,B,R for\tgold, black, red. Other than that this thing is great! I can\'t wait to see what you guys come up with for updates. This thing could be spectacular!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DCFD
reviews.comment: Great app, would recommend it too the fellas!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but I wish...
reviews.comment: Great app widget, but the only thing it could improve on would be for the 48/96 schedule, put the day off the shift, such as; A1 or C2..... Etc.
reviews.author: Bryce Pace

reviews.title: Great concept
reviews.comment: It\'s a great concept and I love it, however the widget freezes sometimes and doesn\'t change to the next day...resulting in me having to take the widget off my home screen and reloading it. Other than that, I love the app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app it been a real help!!!!. It works great !!!!! EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mixed Up
reviews.comment: Looked good. I work a 3 shift 9 day cycle. It had the rotation correct but had the shifts in the wrong spot. Ex. A Shift was correct 3 days on 4 off. But it had C Shift in B spot and B in C spot. And I couldn\'t change it.
reviews.author: A Google User
